ability_arcanebolt_tooltip: Launch an arcane bolt, inflicting <color=orange>{0}</color> base blunt damage and additional <color=orange>{1}</color> damage per level on impact, with a <color=orange>{2}%</color> chance to regenerate one energy point on hit.
ability_blink_tooltip: Teleport forward, up to <color=orange>{0}</color> meters at level zero and <color=orange>{1}</color> meters at the maximum level. If teleporting to an enemy, you will immediately inflict <color=orange>{2}</color> base lightning damage and additional <color=orange>{3}</color> damage per level.
ability_blink_infused_tooltip: Teleport for a second time without consuming any energy, provided that it is done within <color=orange>{0}</color> second(s).
ability_sharpmist_tooltip: Call a mist of elemental leaves, slashing everything around it with <color=orange>{0}</color> base slash damage and additional <color=orange>{1}</color> damage per level every <color=orange>{2}</color> seconds. The leaves will even cut down trees and cut rocks and ores in half.
ability_sharpmist_infused_tooltip: Destroy even harder trees and ores.
attribute_saiyanbody_tooltip: Your body is naturally very strong, providing you with <color=orange>{0}</color> armor per level; punch <color=orange>{1}%</color> even faster with titan arms; spread <color=orange>{2}%</color> of the original damage to nearby enemies; your own body will increase your eitr base by <color=orange>{3}</color>; naturally resistant to <color=orange>poison</color>, <color=orange>frost</color> and <color=orange>fire</color>.
attribute_saiyanbody_armor_forbidden: I do not need armor to protect myself!
attribute_saiyanbody_food_forbidden: I do not need food. What am I, human?
attribute_saiyanstrength_tooltip: Carry <color=orange>{0}</color> extra weight per level; inflict additional <color=orange>{1}%</color> damage on ores with a pickaxe.
